title: Introduction to Classical Chinese via Flipped Learning with Games and Animations

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Chinese character recognition ability and simple sentence interpretation skills
context.additional_context: Blended learning utilizing VR simulations and mobile-friendly game/animation materials in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can identify the overall structure of classical Chinese sentences with 85% accuracy through game-based preview materials
Learners can achieve over 70% accuracy in precise translation and interpretation of 15 key classical Chinese sentences after animated lectures
In project-based assessments, learners can apply four or more major grammatical rules in self-created classical Chinese sentence interpretation scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
